word: Here is where we have met the greatest difficulties in religious matters. The plainest facts may be presented, the clearest truths, sustained by the word of God, may be brought before the mind; but the ear and the heart are closed, and the all-convincing argument is, \93my experience.\94 Some will say, \93The Lord has blessed me in believing and doing as I have; therefore I cannot be in error.\94 \93My experience\94 is clung to, and the most elevating, sanctifying truths of the Bible are rejected.
